definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: In his article, he wrote that my host had taken the cash.
sentences.chinese: 他的文章裏寫到，我的房東收下了這些錢。

sentences.english: The seriously injured boy has been admitted to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 醫院收下了那受重傷的男孩。

sentences.english: Please have this ring for a keepsake .
sentences.chinese: 請收下這個戒指作爲信物。

sentences.english: Please accept the gifts that we give to the nannies and children.
sentences.chinese: 敬請您們收下這些給保育員們和孩子們的禮物。

sentences.english: Jean Valjean accepted the sou with a deep bow.
sentences.chinese: 冉阿讓收下這個蘇，總深深地一鞠躬。

sentences.english: He didn't know he accepted the money at the cost of his future.
sentences.chinese: 他不知道他是以他的前途爲代價而收下這筆錢的。

sentences.english: Here. Please. You must be paid.
Indra took the garland, but placed it on the forehead of his elephant.
sentences.chinese: 因陀羅收下了花環，但把它放置在大象的前額上。

sentences.english: Please do accept my little favor.
sentences.chinese: 這點小意思，請務必收下。

sentences.english: If she keeps the gift, it means she will marry him.
sentences.chinese: 如果女子收下了禮物，則意味着她願意嫁給這位男子。

sentences.english: She accepted the shipment from the deliveryman.
sentences.chinese: 她收下了送貨人送來的貨物。

sentences.english: So he took the fruit, thanked the man, and bade him good-bye.
sentences.chinese: 於是他還是收下“菠蘿”，謝過老人，並同他告別。

sentences.english: He received many gifts ,but he did not accept all of them.
sentences.chinese: 他收到了很多禮物，但是他並沒有收下。

sentences.english: I did not want to be responsible for Mable's insomnia, so I kept the three dollars.
sentences.chinese: 我不想對梅布爾的失眠負責，於是就收下了那三美元。

sentences.english: He pressed the money into the man’s hand. The man tried to give it back, but my father insisted.
sentences.chinese: 男人想把錢推回來，但爸爸硬要他收下。

sentences.english: Please accept these coupons as our Christmas gift to you.
sentences.chinese: 請收下這些贈劵作爲我們送給您的聖誕禮物。

definition: to send/to give as a present
gift given to sb when meeting them for the first time
to return/to give back/to send back/to repatriate
to return a greeting/to send a gift in return
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
to arrest/to capture/to seize/to win (a set, a game etc)
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
